1101100001100101 1100110111010111 0 -> sum: 1010011000111100, cout: 1
0101000100110111 1000011011000010 1 -> sum: 1101011111111010, cout: 0
1001011010100010 1000111100110001 1 -> sum: 0010010111010100, cout: 1
1111001000111000 1001010110010110 1 -> sum: 1000011111001111, cout: 1
1011100110000111 0011111010001001 1 -> sum: 1111100000010001, cout: 0
0101010011011100 0110001010011010 1 -> sum: 1011011101110111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
